General.Name: Zhejiang Construction Investment Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Construction Investment Group Co.,Ltd engages in the construction business in China. It is involved in the undertaking of general contracting of construction projects; design, construction, and consultation of construction projects, civil air defense projects, municipal projects, and landscape garden projects; road and bridge projects, airport runways, mechanical construction, equipment installation works; provision of urban and rural planning and preparation services; and engineering technology development activities. The company also engages in the construction machinery manufacturing and equipment leasing; production and sales of building components; offers electromechanical equipment, hardware tools, building materials, metal materials, chemical raw materials; wholesale of computers and office products; and import and export of automation equipment. In addition, it provides engineering technical training and consulting solutions; international engineering contracting services; exports labor and materials; and property management services. The company was formerly known as Dohia Group Co., Ltd and changed its name to Zhejiang Construction Investment Group Co.,Ltd in June 2021. Zhejiang Construction Investment Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
